评论详情: These are cute but doesnt have as much pink as the picture and they are straight big legs all the way down - they don't flare like the picture. My daughter is a size 12 (or large /xl) and ordered a xlarge in these jeans and couldn't even get them above her knees. Very misleading in size.

Not remotely the same as the picture. The jeans are just a really wide straight leg with a wide bum and too long crotch; it fits oddly on both a tall thin teen with no hips and a shorter curvy teen, so it has nothing to do with shape of the wearer - it’s just badly cut. The pink is barely across each butterfly, and so faded it looks more like someone spilled juice than it was an intentional coloring; it’s less than 1/10 as bright as the listong. My youngest daughter was really excited for this; I’m so glad I decided to open it before giving it to her first.
I’m so bummed! These are BARELY wide at the bottom and the pink is very washed out. I really wanted them to look like the photo- giving super jnco late 90’s wide legged vibes.
They have pink on the butt, there baggier then expected too idk not that well.

I gave it two starts because the pants are in fact FIRE, they look so cool, however, I bought an XL, bro ain't no way bro. An XL was basically a size 6 pant size maybe, if I am being generous. They are also true jeans so they aren't stretchy at all. Great design, won't fit anyone with hips or a behind of any magnitude. I am 5"3 and I wear a size 10-12. Hope this helps anyone thinking they can pull off an XL of these pants, trust me ya can't.
Soft, lightweight material. True to size/color. Very easy to wash.
My daughter loves these and she tries to wear them everyday, they’re cute and comfy, she especially likes the pink details and butterfly’s! I definitely recommend for your teen.
